Posts.Content: I was on Arimidex for 4years and just recently had a reoccurence-one lymph node - clear margins - but enough to make you worry. I now have to come off of that and am on the monthyl Faslodex shots. Does anyone out there have any advise on the side effects? I had an anxiety attack and have now been put on a low dose of Xanax which seems to have helped but where are the other Faslodex users???
Posts.Title: Arimidex vs Falsodex

Posts.Content: I am having my 4th shot tomorrow - oh joy - first 2 were fine - 2 smaller shots with small needles - then last month - horse needle and dose in just 1 largo syringe - have been having weird feelings. Anybody else out there having these??
Posts.Title: Falsodex
